short_summary: Rental of an outdoor firing range facility
full_summary:
# Invitation to Bid - Rental of an Outdoor Firing Range Facility
**Reference Number**: PW-23-01025953
**Notice Type**: Pre-notice of contract award (ACAN) - [Open to bidding]

## Background
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking to rent an outdoor firing range facility to provide firearms training for Border Services Officers.

## Objectives
- Rent a firearms range facility in Quebec for 50 days per year
- Provide safety procedures
- Support the training of armed Border Services Officers

## Period of Contract or Delivery Date(s)
The contract period is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with the option to extend for four (4) additional one-year periods.

## Eligibility and Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified to provide the required services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca on or before the notice closing date.

## Tender Description
The successful supplier must provide a firearms range for the necessary training period and follow safety procedures. The successful supplier must also ensure they comply with all relevant standards.

## Attachment Documents
[Attachments: Standards for Firing Ranges (english and french), Tender Documents (english and french)]

## Contact Information
Contact Lynn Kalp at lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca for further information and to submit a statement of capabilities.

## Notice Closing Date
The notice closes on February 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time.
